refnamediv.refpurpose: Is used to establish the environment for connecting to your server

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
host
Host name or IP address of CAS server.
port
Port number of CAS server (BROKER_PORT configured in $CUBRID/conf/cubrid_broker.conf).
dbname
Name of database.
userid
User name for the database.
passwd
User password.
